Literature.Title: Broad-spectrum antimicrobial peptides by rational combinatorial design and high-throughput screening: the importance of interfacial activity
Literature.Author: Rathinakumar R, Walkenhorst WF, Wimley WC

Literature.Title: A lack of synergy between membrane-permeabilizing cationic antimicrobial peptides and conventional antibiotics.
Literature.Author: He J, Starr CG, Wimley WC

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:21% Hemolysis=15 µM,Sheep erythrocytes:16% Hemolysis=15 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MSC=2.9±1.6µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MSC=4.8±0.8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MSC=7.2±1.4µM),Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC 66031(MSC=>10µM)
